## BlockDragger.getNewLocationAfterDrag\_() method

Calculates the drag delta and new location values after a block is dragged.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
protected getNewLocationAfterDrag_(currentDragDeltaXY: Coordinate): {
        delta: Coordinate;
        newLocation: Coordinate;
    };
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  currentDragDeltaXY | [Coordinate](./blockly.utils_namespace.coordinate_class.md) | How far the pointer has moved from the start of the drag, in pixel units. |

<b>Returns:</b>

{ delta: [Coordinate](./blockly.utils_namespace.coordinate_class.md)<!-- -->; newLocation: [Coordinate](./blockly.utils_namespace.coordinate_class.md)<!-- -->; }

New location after drag. delta is in workspace units. newLocation is the new coordinate where the block should end up.
